verses.roman:
kṛṣṇera mahimā rahu--kebā tāra jñātā
vṛndāvana-sthānera dekha āścarya vibhutā

synonyms: kṛṣṇera—of Lord Kṛṣṇa; mahimā—glories; rahu—let be; kebā—who; tāra—of those; jñātā—a knower; vṛndāvana-sthānera—of the abode of Kṛṣṇa, Vṛndāvana; dekha—just see; āścarya—wonderful; vibhutā—opulences.
translation: "Let the glories of Lord Kṛṣṇa be! Who could be aware of all of them? His abode, Vṛndāvana, has many wonderful opulences. Just try to see them all.
